Text: this should be labeled episode 3 sorry. Itunes named the special episode at the beginning of the Season episode 1 and has been naming them put of sync ever since. This job is really annoying sometimes trying to keep track of everything
All good rkstr I can keep track and thankyou for all your efforts.
no worries rkstr i just check under your downloads if nothing comes up when I search. Thanks for all your hard work!
I'm sure it's intensely frustrating, but it is very much appreciated. I created an account just to say thanks for all your hard work =)
Thanks !  We don't care how they are numbered.  I just thank you for your work.  I am sure this is a lot of effort and I appreciate what you do.  Thanks again !
Thanks Again rkstr all that you do :)
appreciate it! find most of the reality tv uploads end up with funky labelling, we can work it out, sorry it's annoying!
Thanks for making the comment update, rockstar.  I thought I missed one but saw your note and it's all good.  Appreciate all you do!
Thanks for explaining the labeling issues! I was so confused haha but this is season 4 yea? So grateful that you upload these! Wackest season yet!
You know I just watch as they come. No worries rkstr. Thanks for uploading!

Thank-you very, very much Rkstr.
Hope you're having a good weekend.

You have uploaded two S03E04's, both different content. Why aren't you taking down the incorrect one then? Apparently counting is too difficult for Dance Moms watchers; you can tell the quality of demographic that must be into this show if they can't even get SXXEYY right. It's fucking annoying being a non-mentally-handicapped fan of the series. .__.
